com.github.nateowami.solve4x.solver

Interface Algorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CombineLikeTerms

    public interface Algorithm
    An abstract type for all solving strategies to extend. Basically it's a template for classes that will define a particular way to solve (e.g. simplifying). Doing it this way should allow us to loop through solving strategies. If you can think of a better name let me know.
    Author:
    Nateowami

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getSmarts(Equation equation)
      To return the approximate smartness of performing the solving technique on the given Step
      Step getStep(Equation equation)
      Creates a Step object for performing this algorithm on a given expression or equation

      • getStep

        Step getStep(Equation equation)
        Creates a Step object for performing this algorithm on a given expression or equation
        Parameters:
        equation - The expression or equation to do a bit of solving on
        Returns:
        The Step for solving this little bit

        To return the approximate smartness of performing the solving technique on the given Step
